package com.call;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;

public class Calls {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		BufferedReader call = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		int SUM = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < 3; i = i + 1) {
			System.out.println(i);
			System.out.println("From what country do you call? ");
			String country = call.readLine();
			System.out.println("How many minutes was your call? ");
			
			int min = Integer.parseInt(call.readLine());
			System.out.println((i + 1) + " call from " + country + " continued " + min + " minutes");
			SUM = SUM + min;
			/*System.out.println("SUM of calls is " + SUM);*/
		 }
	System.out.println("SUM of calls is " + SUM + " minutes");
	}

}
